parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Variables

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the [[:Category:Data Types|data type]] of an expression. 

The type is returned as on of the following all-uppercase strings:
* "[[Array|ARRAY]]"
* "[[Bool|BOOL]]"
* "[[Code|CODE]]"
* "[[Config|CONFIG]]"
* "[[Control|CONTROL]]"
* "[[Display|DISPLAY]]"
* "[[Group|GROUP]]"
* "[[Location|LOCATION]]"
* "[[Object|OBJECT]]"
* "[[Scalar|SCALAR]]"
* "[[Script|SCRIPT]]"
* "[[Side|SIDE]]"
* "[[String|STRING]]"
* "[[Text|TEXT]]"
* "[[Team Member|TEAM_MEMBER]]"
* "[[Namespace|NAMESPACE]]"
* "[[Diary Record|DIARY_RECORD]]"
* "[[Task|TASK]]"
They represent the available [[Data_Types|data types]] in Arma.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>For comparing types, use [[isEqualType]] command instead in <template><title>arma3</title></template></value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''typeName''' anything

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> anything: [[Anything]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[String]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_msg = "hello"; _result = [[typeName]] _msg;  //_result will be "STRING"</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_unit = [[player]]; _result = [[typeName]] _unit; //_result becomes "OBJECT"</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Values representing direct [[:Category: Data Types| Data Types]]:<code>[[hint]] [[typeName]] 0; //SCALAR
[[hint]] [[typeName]] ""; //STRING
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[true]]; //BOOL
[[hint]] [[typeName]] []; //ARRAY
[[hint]] [[typeName]] {}; //CODE
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[objNull]]; //OBJECT
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[grpNull]]; //GROUP
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[controlNull]]; //CONTROL
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[teamMemberNull]]; //TEAM_MEMBER
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[displayNull]]; //DISPLAY
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[taskNull]]; //TASK
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[locationNull]]; //LOCATION
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[sideUnknown]]; //SIDE
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[text]] ""; //TEXT
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[configFile]]; //CONFIG
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[configNull]]; //CONFIG (Since Arma 3 v1.53.133130)
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[missionNamespace]]; //NAMESPACE
[[hint]] [[typeName]] [[diaryRecordNull]]; //DIARY_RECORD (Since Arma 3 v1.99.146508)</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>[[if]] ([[typeName]] _this [[!=]] "ARRAY") [[exitWith]] {
	[[hint]] "_this is not an array!"
}
//is the same as 
[[if]] ([[typeName]] _this [[!=]] [[typeName]] []) [[exitWith]] {
	[[hint]] "_this is not an array!"
}
//same result but faster in <template><title>arma3</title></template>
[[if]] !(_this [[isEqualType]] []) [[exitWith]] {
	[[hint]] "_this is not an array!"
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[isEqualTypeAll]], [[isEqualType]], [[isEqualTypeParams]], [[isEqualTypeArray]], [[isEqualTypeAny]], [[typeOf]], [[isKindOf]], [[isClass]], [[isArray]], [[isNumber]], [[isText]], [[isNil]], [[isNull]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on September 25, 2016 - 11:14 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Killzone Kid|Killzone Kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
[[typeName]] of [[nil]] is <tt>ANY</tt>, however this is not possible to test as script command is just ignored when any argument is [[nil]]
</dd>
</dl>
<comment><!-- DISCONTINUE Notes --></comment></root>
